::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(gapminder)
gapminder <- gapminder::gapminder
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(skimr)
skim(gapminder)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}

Table: Data summary

|                         |          |
|:------------------------|:---------|
|Name                     |gapminder |
|Number of rows           |1704      |
|Number of columns        |6         |
|_______________________  |          |
|Column type frequency:   |          |
|factor                   |2         |
|numeric                  |4         |
|________________________ |          |
|Group variables          |None      |


**Variable type: factor**

|skim_variable | n_missing| complete_rate|ordered | n_unique|top_counts                             |
|:-------------|---------:|-------------:|:-------|--------:|:--------------------------------------|
|country       |         0|             1|FALSE   |      142|Afg: 12, Alb: 12, Alg: 12, Ang: 12     |
|continent     |         0|             1|FALSE   |        5|Afr: 624, Asi: 396, Eur: 360, Ame: 300 |


**Variable type: numeric**

|skim_variable | n_missing| complete_rate|        mean|           sd|       p0|        p25|        p50|         p75|         p100|hist  |
|:-------------|---------:|-------------:|-----------:|------------:|--------:|----------:|----------:|-----------:|------------:|:-----|
|year          |         0|             1|     1979.50|        17.27|  1952.00|    1965.75|    1979.50|     1993.25|       2007.0|▇▅▅▅▇ |
|lifeExp       |         0|             1|       59.47|        12.92|    23.60|      48.20|      60.71|       70.85|         82.6|▁▆▇▇▇ |
|pop           |         0|             1| 29601212.32| 106157896.74| 60011.00| 2793664.00| 7023595.50| 19585221.75| 1318683096.0|▇▁▁▁▁ |
|gdpPercap     |         0|             1|     7215.33|      9857.45|   241.17|    1202.06|    3531.85|     9325.46|     113523.1|▇▁▁▁▁ |


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
p <- ggplot(data = gapminder,
            mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap,
                          y = lifeExp))
p + geom_point() 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](310_1-27_ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](310_1-27_ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#assign color to a variable gives different colors for each different value in that variable
p1 <-  ggplot(data = gapminder,
             mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp,
                           color = continent))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p1 + geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](310_1-27_ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=864}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p2 <- ggplot(data = gapminder,
            mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p2 + geom_point(color = "purple") +
     geom_smooth(color = "red", method = "loess", se = F, size = 8)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](310_1-27_ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=864}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#other argument: alpha = <number between 0 & 1 excluding>
#size - thickness of points or line
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p <- ggplot(data = gapminder,
            mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap,
                          y = lifeExp))

p + geom_point(color = "purple") +
    geom_smooth(method = "loess") 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](310_1-27_ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=864}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
p + geom_point(alpha = 0.3) +
    geom_smooth(color = "orange", se = F, size = 8, method = "lm") 
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](310_1-27_ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-2.png){width=864}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
p + geom_point(alpha = 0.3) +
    geom_smooth(method = "gam") +
    scale_x_log10(labels = scales::dollar) +
    labs(x = "GDP Per Capita", 
         y = "Life Expectancy in Years",
         title = "Economic Growth and Life Expectancy",
         subtitle = "Data points are country-years",
         caption = "Source: Gapminder.")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](310_1-27_ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=864}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#scale_x_log10 - scales x by log10 (base 10 log of 1000 is 3)
#labs - labels
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# mapping aesthetics per geom
p <- ggplot(data = gapminder, 
            mapping = aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp))

p + geom_point(mapping = aes(color = continent)) +
    geom_smooth(method = "loess")  +
    scale_x_continuous(trans = scales::log_trans())
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](310_1-27_ggplot_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=864}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
#natural log ^
```
:::
